alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 12:50PM PDT until March 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions, including during the evening commute on Monday. Damage to trees and power lines is possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with localized amounts up to 12 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Above 6000 feet. * WHEN...11 AM Monday to 8 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times due to fog and blowing snow. South to southwest winds 30 to 50 mph at times on Monday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
